data.actual_result: Toasts display in English (e.g. "Show Keyboard" and "Photos Selector" rather than the translated equivalents).
data.short_description: Toasts within the attachments menu are in English no matter what language is selected
data.steps_to_repro: - Select a language other than English - Open attachments menu (plus next enter message bar) - Tap and hold any of the four buttons for switching between file selectors (i.e. the buttons for keyboard, camera, photos and files)
